content: Yes, there are several recommended beverages to pair with Peking duck. In Beijing, it is common to drink hot tea while eating Peking duck. This is because the hot tea helps to cleanse the palate and cut through the richness of the duck. Other popular beverage pairing options include beer, white wine or Chinese baijiu, a strong distilled liquor. Some may also choose to drink sodas or juices, depending on personal preference. Ultimately, the best beverage to pair with Peking duck is one that complements your taste buds and enhances your overall dining experience.
